name: YOU ARE U!
description:
U are not alone in the alphabet, and neither in this universe. Other letters like E (enemies) and S (saws) have the urge to brutally destroy U. U can survive! U can destroy them! Upgrade your confidence and buy weapons! Never give up! Trust your feelings! I believe in U! U can dodge every bullet! U can defeat the BOSS! U can do it! Just be yourself!  Because YOU ARE U!

Dodge bullets, upgrade and survive in this highscore-chaser bullet-hell game!

Can you beat my highscore of 4100? Comment your highscore bellow! I believe in you!

Download the game for better performance.

Mobile support on the Web build! 

How to play:

Aim with your mouse

Hold left mouse button to move

On mobile:

Touch anywhere to aim

Hold to move

This game was made in a week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2

Theme: You're Not Alone!

Music and art were made by myself during the jam.

Game updated to version 1.1!

Headphones recommended!

PS: If you get bored of the game, just stay in the menu and vibe to the music! ;)
